dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement...
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Neil - MBA360.com [mailto:Neil@mba360.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 31, 2005 5:07 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement...
Importance: High


Hello,
 
My name is Neil Williamson, owner of  <http://www.mba360.com>
http://www.mba360.com 
 
The following Web site, hosted by your company, is guilty of copyright
infringement...
 
http://www.welcomeyou.net
 
It has blatantly copied content from a Web site we own without express
permission by us to do so.
 
Please visit that site and please then visit ours, which has been up for 5
years. You will also note that the MBA Directory section on the infringer's
website ( <http://www.welcomeyou.net/business-schools-directory.html>
http://www.welcomeyou.net/business-schools-directory.html) still links
straight through to our site that they have copied at MBA360.com.
 
In addition, the same principals have just registered the domain name
<http://www.mba360.net> http://www.mba360.net on 5th February 2005, which
they are also hosting with your company, albeit with no content on the site
yet. This gives me cause for concern and we will be monitoring this
situation closely.
 
As the Web hosting provider of the infringer, please contact the Web site
owner as per your terms of service and grounds of termination policy to
resolve this matter as soon as possible.  Please note that if you allow this
infringement, you are also considered in violation of the Berne Convention
and the Digital Millennium Act, once notified by the true owner of the
copyright.
 
Please ensure all current infringing content is removed immediately.
 
I look forward to hearing from you as a matter of urgency so this matter can
be resolved amicably and satisfactory for all parties concerned.
 
Thank you for your help in this matter.
 
Kind regards,
 
Neil Williamson
Director, 
360 Investments Limited
Exchange Tower,
19 Canning Street,
Edinburgh, EH3 8EH
United Kingdom
